select pr.id, pr.unit_price, pr.code, pr.remark, pr.create_date, pr.merchant_id, mi.name as merchantName, mi.principal, mi.phone as merchantPhone, mi.address from price_rules pr left join merchant_info mi on (mi.id = pr.merchant_id) where 1 = 1
AND pr.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{priceRules.code},'%')
AND pr.remark LIKE CONCAT('%',#{priceRules.remark},'%')
AND mi.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{priceRules.merchantId},'%')
order by pr.create_date desc
